attributes.action: To protect the rights of Christian's and the church to up hold the full Bible.
attributes.additional_details: As Christian's we are people of peace, yet our peace is being attacked. I am asking that our right to speak freely of our faith be protected. The right to share our faith without force to be protected. Our right to live our faith which is based on love, forgiveness and the righteousness which comes only by having a personal relationship with Jesus Christ.
attributes.background: The right for Christian's to have their faith protected and up held. To be able to have religious freedom to believe and up hold the full Bible and that the Bible be protected from those who wish to alter it.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  It's already illegal to discriminate on the grounds of religion. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
